vsParam:
Uh, isn't that Bergamot Sensei.
Sensei, what are you doing?

Ah, Peppermint... and [px].
I am looking at an alchemical recipe.

The paper with recipe on it is so old,
and it has gone yellow. I am afraid that it may break anytime.

This one was excavated from the ruins lately.
And the method is completely different than modern ones.

I only know that
this is an "alchemical recipe" by now...

Headmaster Jones Wort entrusted me for
its interpretation and trial synthesis later.
I have no idea what to do next.

Giving such an important job to you,
it means that Headmaster Jones Wort trusts you very much!

But... I thought you could handle it easily,
who'd know that you encounter difficulties too.

Yeah. The key part of this recipe is blank,
I can't see the materials and steps for synthesis.
Uh!? Then it cannot be used!?

No... I think this paper was specially treated, words on it will
be revealed in somewhere with a high mana concentration.

So I can't interpret it in the Academy.
I am thinking about where I should go.

Uh huh... Although I don't quite get it clear, but the words
written on it really draw my attention, [px]!

Yeah... Though Headmaster Jones Wort said that this is
classified, I think you are somehow destined to see it.

Um. What you said just now were all classified!?
So we are now aware of something we shouldn't have known...

No, this is a perfect chance for you to study ancient alchemy.
[px], come with me.

What are you saying? If you really want to study alchemy
thoroughly, you have to go through things like this.

Ha-ha, you are right. This is an after-school class
even Headmaster Jones Wort wants us to keep secret.
Alright. Let's get prepared and hit the road.

Er, I think this place will do.
Let me see...

The recipe starts to reveal. Looks like the concentration
here is sufficient... But I think a guest came here before us.

I can't interpret the recipe with the monster here.
Let's deal with it first!

Alright, it should be okay now.
Are you hurt, [px], Peppermint?

We are good! How's the recipe?
Can you read it clearly!?

Yeah. It seems that mana has fully soaked this paper
when we fought the monster. Words on it are pretty clear now.

It seems to be... an item for sacrifice.
But it doesn't say the shape and effect of the item.

The materials and steps of synthesis are pretty clear.
We should be able to get all these materials.

Really!? Let's get back to the Academy!
And synthesize this item!

No rush. We can's synthesize now.
We have to collect enough materials first.
Gee, my excitement was in the wrong place!

Don't say that. As my assistants, you two have contributed
a lot to this.
I'll let you know at once if I make progress.
That's wonderful! We'll wait for your good news!

Let's go back.
Stay sharp before we reach the Academy.

This experience which we can't have in class
turns out to be pretty interesting, [px]!
